messages: c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:48): http://tools.gallery2.org/pastebin/642 can someone tell me why my right float on line 37 isn't sized right look on line 49 it should be the same size as my left float which is another form?
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:48): reisio: no one answered me in css, figured I better go to a html channel.
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:49): Some reason my floats are reading right in firefox, but do in IE
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:49): reisio: what would you use then?
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (08:50): you can do a lot with just margins and floats
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:52): and if needed I could put tables inside of css
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:52): is it better viewable by browsers?
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:53): or more accurate with different browsers
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (08:54): you don't want to use tables for layout
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (08:54): tables are for data that only makes sense (or makes more sense) when put into a table
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (08:55): everyone knows that transparent Gifs are for layout
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (08:56): only if they represent some form of data that needs to be in a table
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:57): say i got a form with <option></option> and I want category about the form
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (08:57): (only using two-column tables for simplicity's sake - often two-column tables aren't so smart :p)
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:57): would i just make a table?
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (08:57): tdd1984: using tables for forms is often suitable
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (08:57): k well thats what im doing now
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (08:59): can't do much with that tiny bit of code you pasted
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (09:00): well for some reason my form isn't resizing
c8e7f46a8a672001016ce354ffe822b0 (09:02): reisio: do you know why
